title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
Transform your home into a winter wonderland with our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set! This set includes a 23.6-inch wreath and an 8.8-foot garland adorned with snowflake pine needle branches, two types of pine cones, berry clusters, frosted branches, and 100 LED warm lights. 

No need to worry about assembly as this set comes ready to hang. The high-quality materials used are sturdy, hypoallergenic, and fireproof for your peace of mind. With a battery-operated power source and a timer function of 6 hours on and 18 hours off, you can enjoy the festive glow without any hassle.

Suitable for both indoor and outdoor use, you can place this set on your wall, door, fireplace, living room, bedroom, dining room, or windows. And with a 365-day warranty and 24-hour customer service availability, you can trust in the durability and quality of this set. Don't miss out on the opportunity to elevate your holiday decor with this beautiful and maintenance-free wreath and garland set!
